SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM , O.FCLTS_JOB_SE , TO_CHAR(O.QC_MNG_SEQ) QC_MNG_SEQ , O.FCLTS_MNG_NO , (SELECT PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = O.FCLTS_MNG_NO) PRT_FCLTY_NM , O.QC_INSP_SE , TO_CHAR(O.QC_INSP_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_INSP_DT , O.INSPECTOR , O.QC_INSP_RESULT , O.RM , Q.ENFORCE_YEAR , Q.QC_MNG_NM , Q.QC_INSP_INSTT_NM , Q.RESPON_ENGINEER_NM , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_BEGIN_DT , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_END_DT , Q.QC_INSP_BDGT , Q.QC_INSP_AMT , Q.STTUS_EVL_LVL , Q.ACTION_CN , Q.ACTION_SE FROM QC_MNG_OBJ_FCLTS_F O INNER JOIN QC_MNG_DTLS_F Q ON O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO AND O.FCLTS_JOB_SE = Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE AND O.QC_MNG_SEQ = Q.QC_MNG_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1
AND Q.QC_INSP_INSTT_NM LIKE '%' || #sQcInspInsttNm# || '%'
AND O.FCLTS_MNG_NO = LIKE #sFcltsMngNo# || '%'
AND O.QC_INSP_DT >= TO_DATE(#sQcInspDtFr#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND O.QC_INSP_DT <= TO_DATE(#sQcInspDtTo#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , O.FCLTS_JOB_SE , O.QC_MNG_SEQ , O.FCLTS_MNG_NO ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM QC_MNG_OBJ_FCLTS_F O INNER JOIN QC_MNG_DTLS_F Q ON O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO AND O.FCLTS_JOB_SE = Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE AND O.QC_MNG_SEQ = Q.QC_MNG_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1
AND Q.QC_INSP_INSTT_NM LIKE '%' || #sQcInspInsttNm# || '%'
AND O.FCLTS_MNG_NO = LIKE #sFcltsMngNo# || '%'
AND O.QC_INSP_DT >= TO_DATE(#sQcInspDtFr#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND O.QC_INSP_DT <= TO_DATE(#sQcInspDtTo#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM , O.FCLTS_JOB_SE , TO_CHAR(O.QC_MNG_SEQ) QC_MNG_SEQ , O.FCLTS_MNG_NO , (SELECT PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = O.FCLTS_MNG_NO) PRT_FCLTY_NM , O.QC_INSP_SE , TO_CHAR(O.QC_INSP_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_INSP_DT , O.INSPECTOR , O.QC_INSP_RESULT , O.RM , Q.ENFORCE_YEAR , Q.QC_MNG_NM , Q.QC_INSP_INSTT_NM , Q.RESPON_ENGINEER_NM , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_BEGIN_DT , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_END_DT , Q.QC_INSP_BDGT , Q.QC_INSP_AMT , Q.STTUS_EVL_LVL , Q.ACTION_CN , Q.ACTION_SE FROM QC_MNG_OBJ_FCLTS_F O INNER JOIN QC_MNG_DTLS_F Q ON O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO AND O.FCLTS_JOB_SE = Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE AND O.QC_MNG_SEQ = Q.QC_MNG_SEQ WHERE O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# AND O.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe# AND O.QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#sQcMngSeq#) AND O.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo#
